setEffects.4: When the equipping character is off-field, Lunar Reaction DMG is increased by 20%. When the party's Moonsign Level is at least Ascendant Gleam, Lunar Reaction DMG will be further increased by 40%. This effect will disappear after the equipping character is active for 3s.

flower.name: Moonlit Offering's Opulent Dream
flower.desc: A meticulously carved floral ornament meant to highlight the resplendent beauty of the goddesses of the heavenly moons, crafted in ancient times by artisans who sculpted statues of them.

plume.name: Moonlit Offering's Parting Light
plume.desc: A quill that, in ancient times, granted boundless inspiration to priests who penned prayers to the heavenly moons.

sands.name: Moonlit Offering's Final Hour
sands.desc: An hourglass meant to commemorate the final hour, prepared by sages who, in ancient times, sought truth from the heavenly moons.

goblet.name: Moonlit Offering's Libation
goblet.desc: A wine cup lost in the final revelry of an ancient rite, in which believers once offered sacrifices to the heavenly moons.

circlet.name: Moonlit Offering's Silver Crown
circlet.desc: A silver circlet set aside at the final syllable of a hymn, worn by poets who, in ancient times, sang in praise of the heavenly moons.
